title: An Act authorizing Valley Chapel in the town of Uxbridge to construct and operate a columbarium for the disposition of ashes of certain community members

abstracts.abstract: By Mr. Fattman, a petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 1529) of Ryan C. Fattman for legislation to authorize Valley Chapel in the town of Uxbridge to construct and operate a columbarium for the disposition of ashes of certain community members.  Public Health.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Public Health
Hearing scheduled for 09/29/2025 from 09:00 AM-01:00 PM in A-2

Hearing rescheduled to 09/29/2025 from 09:00 AM-11:30 PM in A-2                                                                                                                                                and Virtual Hearing updated to New End Time
